argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j n

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> n = N ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> ( n e. NN0 <-> N e. NN0 ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> j = J ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> ( j e. 2ndc <-> J e. 2ndc ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> ( j e. Haus <-> J e. Haus ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( n = N -> ( EEhil ` n ) = ( EEhil ` N ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( n = N -> ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) = ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eceq1d | |- ( n = N -> [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= = [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) |
| 9 |  | #P_llyeq | |- ( [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= = [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= -> Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= = Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( n = N -> Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= = Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= = Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> ( j e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= <-> J e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 5, 12 | #P_3anbi123d | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> ( ( j e. 2ndc /\ j e. Haus /\ j e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= ) <-> ( J e. 2ndc /\ J e. Haus /\ J e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( ( n = N /\ j = J ) -> ( ( n e. NN0 /\ ( j e. 2ndc /\ j e. Haus /\ j e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= ) ) <-> ( N e. NN0 /\ ( J e. 2ndc /\ J e. Haus /\ J e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_df-mntop | |- ManTop = { <. n , j >. | ( n e. NN0 /\ ( j e. 2ndc /\ j e. Haus /\ j e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` n ) ) ] ~= ) ) } |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_brabga | |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ J e. V ) -> ( N ManTop J <-> ( N e. NN0 /\ ( J e. 2ndc /\ J e. Haus /\ J e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ J e. V ) -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_biantrurd | |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ J e. V ) -> ( ( J e. 2ndc /\ J e. Haus /\ J e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) <-> ( N e. NN0 /\ ( J e. 2ndc /\ J e. Haus /\ J e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ J e. V ) -> ( N ManTop J <-> ( J e. 2ndc /\ J e. Haus /\ J e. Locally [ ( TopOpen ` ( EEhil ` N ) ) ] ~= ) ) ) |
